quote_first: “Drive safe,” says Ned. He texted me to send the van. That was at
quote_last: , I know because I looked at the clock, the art deco one right over there, see? Keeps perfect time. Then, I dunno, he just vanished.
title: Stone Mattress
author: Margaret Atwood

quote_last: . All I’ve got left today is take in the laundry and fix dinner.
title: The Elephant Vanishes
author: Haruki Murakami
